column5: Took my Little one fishing for her first time last week....her first bass
Great report and pics steelheader  Give the Little one a high five for me  Thansk for sharing Leechman
NICE FISH FOR FIRST BASS  LOL CONGRATS. GREAT NOW I GOT COMPITION LOL
Very impressive first bass!!!Congrats and thanks for sharing.
HAHA absolutely precious and that bass must have given her the fight of her life! It's almost as big as she is.
WOW!! Congrats on her first fish....why waste time with panfish as a start eh?? Get her right into some lunker bass!!! LOL.  Great job!
